entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
